Saskatoon Family Lawyers

It's not uncommon for separation matters to cause stress, when this occurs putting your trust in the right lawyer can alleviate the anxiety of what the outcome will be.  Get immediate answers and solutions from trusted and experienced family law lawyers.

NEW CLIENT - CLICK HERE TO START

For Quick answers
Law firm

Area of Practice

We only practice family law so our awareness, knowledge, and experience in the field is extensive and current.
Narrowing our activity ensures we have a continuous pulse on the latest trends, precedents, and case law, and are at the forefront of new developments in family law and the family court system.

Our flat rate billing with fixed fees create transparency and set clear boundaries for both the price of our legal fees and the scope of our legal work. Unexpected legal fees are eliminated from the Evolve Family Law client experience.

Divorce

Regardless of your reason for divorce, this is an emotional time. In Canada, there are three grounds for divorce.

Find Out More ⟶

Support

It’s not uncommon for separations to cause financial stress. When this occurs the court can remediate the situation with different forms of financial support.

Find Out More ⟶

Parenting & Access

Solutions are different for every family and we will navigate unique hurdles, such as long-distance, addictions or special needs.

Find Out More ⟶

Agreements

For those who want special consideration in the event of a death or separation, an interspousal agreement is essential to protecting their interests.

Find Out More ⟶

Property

When distributing property in a divorce, the first step is to determine which assets are considered family assets, business assets or individual assets.

Find Out More ⟶

Independent Legal Advice

Our office can assist by advising you in relation to an agreement you have already reached with another party.

Find Out More ⟶

Adoption & Guardianship

The process of welcoming a child into your home and family is heartwarming, but it can also be challenging when it comes to legal proceedings.

Find Out More ⟶

Why we are committed to flat rates

Providing flat rate billing, also known as fixed fee billing, introduces more certainty in your legal journey.
Our business model’s success relies on quality client experiences, not drawn-out battles. We advocate for healthy relationships between all parties involved, during and after your legal engagement, and work towards results that keep your best interests focused.
 
Although there are few winners in family law with compromise and compassion, we find lasting resolutions. Our respect for the individual and family is not to be mistaken for weakness. Our legal team negotiates fiercely and has the depth of court and trial experience necessary to confront an unreasonable adversary.

Voted “Best Of Saskatoon” Family Lawyers

NEW CLIENT - CLICK HERE TO START

What People Say About Us

Client Testimonials

"Beau and his team were efficient, diligent and very pleasant to deal with. It was was very easy to communicate with anybody from the practice - just a simple email away and always a prompt response. They offered me wonderful support when I needed it most. I would recommend them to anybody looking for a family law practice."
Oksana C.
"All questions were always answered thoroughly, always keeping me in the loop. I felt comfortable with everything we did and was never left in the dark or confused with how or why things were the way they were. I was always responded to in a timely manner with my many questions and concerns. The outcome was exactly what I hoped for and what they prepared me for. Thanks again!"
A. S.
"Everyone I have worked with in the office has been fantastic. They have all been very helpful and quick to answer any questions and give guidance. I appreciate the teamwork model. I feel like everyone there has my back and is looking out for my best interests."
M. P.
"I like the model of flat rate service. I know what I am getting for my money and am not surprised at the end. Beau is a very personable lawyer and tries very hard to get immediate results with keeping the best interest of those most affected ( the children) by the divorce in mind."
s. C.
"Beau Atkins was amazing to deal with. He was always upfront with costs. Gave me tips on how to keep my costs down and told me the things I needed to hear when I was being unreasonable or had unachievable expectations. All of the staff within the office have been helpful, pleasant to deal with, happy and positive. This firm helped the light shine bright in a dark time. So thankful to have had them backing me in a hard time."
Jordana G.
"Melissa has been excellent. She is prompt with her replies and shows genuine care for her clients. I have been very pleased with my experience with her and she has eased my mind numerous times throughout this process."
K. S.
"I had an awesome experience the office went above and beyond and were extremely helpful and knowledgeable. I have been recommending the office to everyone. It’s been awesome and there was always answers to every question I got. Thank you again."
L. I.
"No one ever plans on being thrown into the world of divorce and family law and I was absolutely terrified of navigating the system. My first concern was always my son and ensuring he was looked after ... and through the Evolve team, I feel my interests were best represented. It was a very overwhelming process and I never once felt that my 'team' wasn't working to get a satisfactory outcome for me. This has been the longest 4+ years of my life and I am so appreciative that they took the time to explain things to me in terms I could understand and were willing to work with me and my financial situation because that has always been a HUGE concern for myself."
M. K.
"I separated in 2009 with 4 children of the marriage, a complicated situation no matter the approach. When things are acrimonious it can be untenable. In order to avoid ongoing court proceedings and focus on our children, I chose to let all of my “issues” go and continued on, focused on parenting, until being served with notice to appear in Chambers, November 2017 to resolve a laundry list of new issues being brought against me. Feeling overwhelmed and knowing I had very limited resources to secure counsel, I reached out to Beau Atkins of Evolve Family Law and explained the lengthy and tiresome situation. He appeared in court for me in November and got the result we wanted. An interim Order and direction to a Pretrial Conference in April 2018. Through this thoroughly unpleasant experience Beau ensured I was well informed, that I was directing my emotions appropriately and that I felt supported and cared for the entire time.

More importantly they represented my interests as well as those of our children to help us reach a fair and equitable outcome and did all of this while working within my very limited financial means.
Allia J.
"Beau is a man of his word. From the very first time I retained his service he was very forward and truthful as to what I can expect and what he was going to do for me. He delivered in spades. You definitely get what you pay for when you hire Beau. When the unfortunate happens and you need a lawyer for divorce I can not think of a better lawyer than Beau Atkins."
Brock P.
